html:
Burna Boy has announced a tour in support of new album No Sign of Weakness. The tour begins at Colorado’s Red Rocks Amphitheatre, in November, and finds the Nigerian musician performing across North America. All of the North American shows (except the Red Rocks one) will feature a special 360-degree stage. See Burna Boy’s tour dates below.

No Sign of Weakness is out July 10. The album includes the singles “Bundle by Bundle,” “Update,” “Sweet Love,” and “TaTaTa.”
